title: How to Enable Steam Beta

steps.headline: Click on "Steam" button on the left corner of your Steam client.
Find the item labeled "Beta participation", and a button "Change".
Change the "Beta participation" to "Steam Beta Update".
Click on "Restart Steam" and you'll be good to go!

text: Open your Steam  Click on "Steam" button on the left corner of your Steam client.  Find the item labeled "Beta participation", and a button "Change". Click on it. Change the "Beta participation" to "Steam Beta Update".  Click on "Restart Steam" and you'll be good to go!
